column3: “I sleep poorly and am always looking for a new indica that keeps me down - and I have found it - deep sedation, incredibly beautiful body relaxation and pain reduction.”

“Awesome indica strain.  The smell is like very sweet berries and some hints of cheese as well.  Great for creativity, appetite and libido.  Smoking this gives you a full bodied high that creeps up on you, and makes you feel a bit clouded. Last for a good 3 hours (or until you doze off).  I enjoyed this!  Doesn’t knock me out every time though, but it really makes me want to create and have sex. No paranoia, anxiety o...”

“Purps for days! :)
Excellent trim job, dense sticky purple nugs with a nice blueberry aroma and a indescribable taste.
Got me to sleep pretty well.”
“Recently got some crumble of this strain. Very good tasting. Very smooth. This strain got me feeling good as hell.”
“I have actually smoked this before, beautiful bud, dense nugs, fruity bluish taste. Got pretty high too. Not top shelf though.”
